About

Hi there, I'm Aldrin. I am currently working as an Engineer for different Semiconductor manufacturing companies for over a decade now.

I have created this blog to share my journey in work and in life and how this experience might be a little help to others.

You can reach out to me here - aldrincerezo@outlook.com
